title: Trapezoidal sum of accumulation function part - a

content.question: Use the trapezoidal rule with four equal subdivisions of the closed interval [0,1] to approximate F(1).

frqParts.text: Use the trapezoidal rule with four equal subdivisions of the closed interval [0,1] to approximate F(1).

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
